title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 363-6.15 - Gas venting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 363-6.15 - Gas venting

State Regulations

The project engineer must demonstrate that landfill gas
will be adequately controlled and removed from the landfill in a manner to
ensure the overall stability of the landfill and its final cover system, and to
reduce the concentration and pressure gradient of explosive gases to control
gas migration. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
363-6.15

Adopted

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
